content.question: In lines 2-3, frueris mari, fontibus, agro, villa pulcherrima is translated

choices.label: you enjoy the sea, the springs, the field, and your very beautiful house
you enjoy your very beautiful house with the sea, its springs, and its fields
while the seas, the springs, the field, and your very beautiful house were enjoyed
you will have enjoyed the seas, the springs, the field, and your very beautiful house

content.answer: you enjoy the sea, the springs, the field, and your very beautiful house

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
